name: Triple Chocolate Cheesecake
description: Crust: Oreos and butter; Filling: cream cheese - 10oz chocolate; Topping: heavy cream - sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Crust: Preheat oven to 350F. Grease a 9 inch springform pan and set aside. Finely crush cookies, add melted butter, and mix. Press crumb mixture onto the bottom of the prepared pan and bake for 8 minutes. Remove from oven and set on while rack to cool.

Filling: Melt chocolate and set aside to cool. Mix cream cheese and sugar until smooth; mix in cocoa powder. Add the eggs on at a time, mixing on low speed and not overbeating. Add melted chocolate and keep mixing on low. Pour the filling over the crust and smooth the top. Bake until the center looks dry (about 1 hour 10 minutes). Cool on a wire rack for 5 minutes, then run a thin knife around the sides of the pan. Let it set in a fridge for at least 8 hours.
In a medium saucepan, stir together cream, chocolate, and sugar on low heat until the chocolate is completely melted and the texture is smooth. Cool and pour over the cheesecake.
